comment: Ms. Deal is a lovely professor. She genuinely cares for her students, but it's up to you to accept the help she's willing to give. I enjoyed her class, and it was a plus that she allowed us many opportunities for extra credit. My class was a hybrid class, so we met once a week and had a checklist to complete every Saturday.

professor deal is very nice and will help you if you ask. she will let you redo essays if you don't make the grade you want. her class is very boring though and you do have a lot of work each week. a discussion post, a quiz, and a short assignment usually. it's not bad, easy to make an a but it is a lot of work.

Professor Deal is so sweet, caring, and smart. Always clear about what is expected. She is very organized and gives an appropriate amount of work. She genuinely cares about how you do, and wants to help you succeed. She is very personable , and will give you reminders which is very nice in college. You will love it.

She is super strict about deadlines & has a zero tolerance policy for late work, even if you are a freshman. Doesn't believe in 100's and her lectures are really pointless. I learned more in my AP literature class in high school. Gives an unhealthy amount of homework every week. Went to her office hours for help & she sent me to the writingCenter..

Professor Deal was amazing! She is literally so caring and the work load was easy. You have four essays which she explains in detail and you have like a month to complete them, and you have a few in class discussion post that were very simple. I absolutely loved Professor Deal I would recommend anybody take her!

She's a very sweet lady that cares about her students. Her class, however, is very group oriented and there's a lot of discussions. She sets out very clear guidelines on her assignments so it's not confusing at all. She has a really good speaking voice and made an 8 am class a lot more fun that expected. Would take the class again if possible.

If you don't like group discussion, this is not the class for you.  You are graded on your participation in reading assignments so if you do not participate you are counted as absent.  4 papers and interesting reading assignments that you must keep up with to participate.  After 5 absences, you fail.

She is a sweet woman. She does not expect a lot out of her students, but does expect everyone to say at least *something* during the semester. Papers were easy, and there was a research project where we presented our ideas to the class. She encourages creative writing, and made the class fun. She sets the bar low, and if you excel you get A's.
Always participate in group discussions, read, take notes over the chapters assigned, do discussion posts on d2l, write the assigned papers and you will get an easy A.
Great teacher! She does assign a few papers but the instructions were very clear and she is always willing to help. Easy going class. Would definitely take again.

She's very nice, but I wish she wouldn't be so hard on shy people who don't like speaking in front of classmates every class period.  I managed a B, but since it is not a public speaking class, I think our participation should not affect us as much.  Quiet people are intelligent too!

She was a really great teacher, but take the essays seriously they literally make your grade. You can miss 3 classes without penalty but after that your grade goes down. (That's the college's policy for all English classes though.
Gives you a break when you slip up and submit a paper incorrectluy or a little late. Understands that frshman have alot to learn about being a college student

I liked Professor Deal. She's a very friendly lady, and she's very helpful if you ask her questions or email her. Her class does get a little boring at times, but she's still a great professor. There are 3 major essays and 1 project. I would definitely recommend taking her class.
Such a sweet old lady. You could easily get an A in her class if you just show up and do the assignments. She won't grade essays harsh either. Take that from a bad writer!

My only complaint is that she does not like students who do not fully participate and engage in class.  She prefers outgoing, talkative people who keep the conversation going and doesnt realize that not everyone is like that.  Attendance is mandatory or you will fail.  She's a nice teacher, but too demanding on trivial items.    Not taking her 1102

She is very passionate about the topics she discusses in class. The lecture tend to be pretty long but she means well. You only write 4 papers over the semester and she gives you a fair amount of time to learn and prepare for each. She is willing to help whenever you have questions and she brings food/candy all the time. Super great lady, take her!
She loves what she does and wants students to be successful. Give lots of good feedback
She grades your essays with a fine tooth comb.  4 long essays.  Take someone else.

You don't have any tests, but you write many papers.  You also have to do peer reviews.  However, the papers are long and she is very picky.  You have assigments every class to read in one of two book.  You must be prepared to discuss each assignment everyday in class to gain participation points.  Attendance is mandatory or you will fail.

THeree are too many other good engl 1102 teachers to take other than this professor.  She treats you like you are in middle school and she is always right even when she isn't.   She does not want students to succeed, but likes to watch them suffer.

She grades your essays harshly.  she doesn't believe in giving a 100 for anything perfect she tells you.  So your highest grade can be a 95.  my highest grade was an 85 .  it is very difficult to get an A in this class.  You can get a C easilyk, but you really have to work for a B.
I took this class at 8am and never really made it. She gives clear instructions on assignments though. Attendance is MANDATORY, so if you can't wake up DON'T DO IT.

Took her for english 1101.  She is NOT an easy grader like some people seem to think.  I always received an A in composition/lit in high school, and I struggled in this class just to get a B.  She likes participation in her discussions.  I would recommend someone else.   I lost confidence in my writing ability taking this class.
Professor Deal is an excellent, caring professor! She genuinely wants you to do well. Very fair grader with great feedback for your work. I would take Professor Deal again in a heartbeat!

I was expecting more work and more writing. Sadly, we didn't get either. I say sadly because I'm walking away from this class with a high passing grade, but I don't feel like I learned much.   ENGL 1101 and 1102 are classes that will follow you throughout your college career. It's imperative you learn how to write a paper.
Professor Deal was hands down the best English professor I have ever taken. she is the sweetest lady and wants you to do the best you can do. Such a fair grader. Definitely recommend taking her class

I took professor Deal for both 1101 and 1102. She is very kind and helpful, don't hesitate to ask her if you are having any problems. She never gives quizzes or tests, just essays and discussion board posts on D2L. Professor Deal is a very fair grader and I highly recommend taking her.
Nicest lady ever. She brought us bagel from panera. She wants you to pass and is so sweet. Take this class
Sweetest lady I have ever met. Easy A.

Professor Deal understands that this is a required class, so she tries to make it interesting. You will have to write journals, informal writing (blog posts), 4 formal essays, and do peer reviews. The final is a reflective essay. She is a very fair grader, and gives very good feedback.  Her goal is for you to succeed! Taking her for 1102 :)
Professor Deal is great! She gives tons of feedback on essays and the class had lots of group activities. We got out early sometimes, too.
I love Professor Deal! She is a big help and genuinely cares about her students. Take her if you can.
TAKE HER! One of my favorite classes. Great time, learned a lot, very interesting course material about our food industry, excellent professor. It's been an all positive experience. Gonna miss it!

Mrs. Deal is the best English teacher I have ever had. Easier than a high school class, everything is spoon fed to you. She is very approachable and nice. Absolutely love her. Class might be boring but your best choice for an English class!!! Take her! Knows her material.
Professor Deal's lass was very enjoyable and she's very helpful. She's very knowledgeable and gives good feedback.I wanted to take her for english II but class was full
I love that you write papers and apply what you learn rather than take tests; very clear guidelines and passionate and enthusiastic about teaching

She was a very helpful teacher and great grader. It would be asinine to not make a good grade in her class as long as you attend and do all of the work. She is a very helpful teacher however she seems to be confused a lot of the time when people ask her questions. I would recommend her class!
